meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mike Dindoffer Ali Filipowicz James Holzhauer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7970.

td.p: Mike Dindoffer, a writer and teacher from Greenfield, Massachusetts
Ali Filipowicz, a homemaker from Alexandria, Virginia
James Holzhauer, a professional sports gambler from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 6-day cash winnings total $325,877)

tr.td: GENERAL KNOWLEDGE
WOMEN OF POLITICS
I'D LIKE TO SELL A VOWEL
AMERICAN LITERATURE
CITY ADJECTIVES
GOOGLE'S TOP SEARCHES, 1999-2018
(Alex: As they celebrate their 20th anniversary. We're talking about searches in English.)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
